A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've read some rough reviews out there. Yes\, the flying space wizard was a bit much to swallow. The Plot holes and rule breaking was rough. But remember\, this isn't a scientifically accurate space movie. This is a space opera. It was enjoyable for what it's worth. The dual light saber fight in the throne room was fun. Overall\, it could've been better. Still enjoyable though.
